props.name: onClose
props.docblock: A callback to close the modal dialog

description.text: A callback to close the modal dialog

props.name: isOpen
props.docblock: Is the modal dialog open or closed

description.text: Is the modal dialog open or closed

props.name: hasCloseButton
props.docblock: The close 'x' icon button in the top right of the dialog box

description.text: The close 'x' icon button in the top right of the dialog box

props.name: size
props.docblock: Sizes determine the maximum width of the dialog box

description.text: Sizes determine the maximum width of the dialog box

props.name: variant
props.docblock: The visual style of the dialog box

description.text: The visual style of the dialog box

props.name: closeLabel
props.docblock: The label supplied to the close icon button if one is rendered

description.text: The label supplied to the close icon button if one is rendered

props.name: isFullscreenScroll
props.docblock:
Determines where a scrollbar should appear if a modal is too large for the
viewport. When false, the ModalDialog.Body receives a scrollbar, when true
the browser window itself receives the scrollbar.

description.text:
Determines where a scrollbar should appear if a modal is too large for the
viewport. When false, the ModalDialog.Body receives a scrollbar, when true
the browser window itself receives the scrollbar.
